title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python/JS libraries for downloading and running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with GPU/CPU acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client (PyPI: ollama) providing sync/async APIs, streaming chat/generate endpoints, embeddings, and pull/push model registry support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript client (npm: ollama) with browser & Node support, streaming responses, and full Ollama REST API coverage.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat, and embedding components with tool-calling support.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI (Docker-ready) for Ollama with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG uploads, and admin settings.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client (Maven Central: ollama4j) offering synchronous & reactive APIs, model management, and streaming completions.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem (RubyGems: ollama) wrapping the Ollama REST API with idiomatic Ruby blocks and streaming support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that adds fuzzy model search, conversation history, and shell completions atop the Ollama daemon.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration (PyPI: ollama-haystack) exposing Ollama as Generator, Embedder, and ChatGenerator nodes for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET client (NuGet: OllamaSharp) with async streaming, model operations, and strongly-typed chat messages.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service container plus sidecar model downloader for reproducible CI pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG example using Ollama embeddings and llama.cpp for vector search without external services.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and persistent model storage.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-stage Dockerfile and docker-compose samples (GPU & CPU) published by the Ollama team.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate (crates.io: ollama-rs) offering async client, SSE streaming, and model registry helpers.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client (pkg.go.dev: github.com/ollama/ollama-go) with context cancellation and streaming chat support.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers query local Ollama models with slash commands and per-user rate limits.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that threads Ollama responses, supports file snippets, and private model selection via shortcuts.

title: ollama-macos-swiftui
summary: Native macOS SwiftUI menu-bar app for Ollama with conversation history and model switcher, distributed via TestFlight.
